SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Subscription ID" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_SUBSCRIPTION_ID#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Certificate location" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CERT_PATH#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Certificate Password" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CERT_PSWD#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Setting execution environment :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.HTTP_TIMEOUT_PARAMETERS
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Action name :SET &UC4RB_AZR_ACTION_NAME# = "GET_SUBSCRIPTION_INFO"
! define java options and values :DEFINE &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#, string, 12
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[1] = "--action" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_ACTION_NAME#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[2] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[3] = "-cto" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[4] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[5] = "-rto" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_READ_TIMEOUT#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[6] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[7] = "-sid" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_SUBSCRIPTION_ID#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[8] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[9] = "--keystore" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CERT_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[10] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[11] = "-pwd" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CERT_PSWD#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[12] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_AZR_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** CONFIGURE CONNECTION ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** CONFIGURE CONNECTION ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
